promo.promoText:
If you purchase health insurance before 31 March, you can claim immediately on many Extras including most general dental, optical, physio, chiropractic and remedial massage. *

*Conditions apply
promo.discountText: Australian Unity offers a 4% discount to customers who choose to pay their premium by direct debit. This has been included in the price displayed.
